ValidationRule.description: Merchant Services Reps shouldn't be able to change the record type once it's a DSA Record Type case #22921475 allows Turturro users to edit record
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Payment Processing (DSA) Opportunity" ), (ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId)), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES ZONE 30 ANCILLARY"))), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES DISTRICT 217 - TURTURRO"))), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"VIRTUAL SALES AND NSS"))), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"NSS Director"))), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Payment Processing Opportunity record type once it's a DSA Record Type
